Html: Is there a way to use Rawr's Optimizer, for example, to choose blue-quality or rare gems like the +40 Intellect or +60 Stamina gems, but filter those gems out for items on my character that are below item-level 346? The idea is that I just do not want to spend extra resources on anything below item-level 346. And I think that the same feature, if it's available, would be very useful with enchants. I would love to make epic or highest-score enchants only available for 359+ items, but nothing below that. Apologies if this is already answered somewhere else, a pasted link to an existing page with the info will be enough and appreciated.
If you can put this in the Issue Tracker as a Item Request it would make it easier for us devs.

You are able to already do this to a point with gemming templates (We enable the top ones by default), though it sounds as if you'd like them to essentially scale with current gear?  Yeah, that would need to be a request in the issue tracker.
